parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Joktan -- a descendant of Shem and ancestor of several Arabian tribes

parse: Verb - Qal - Perfect - third person masculine singular
str2: To bear young, to beget, medically, to act as midwife, to show lineage
Almodad -- a son of Joktan, also his desc
Sheleph -- 'drawn out', a son of Joktan and his desc
Hazarmaveth -- a son of Joktan, also his desc
Jerah -- a son of Joktan, also his desc
